<h3 id="X38049">X(38049) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(1), X(6), X(10)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*a^3+3*(b+c)*a^2+2*(b^2+c^2)*a+(b+c)*(b^2+c^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38049) = X(1)+5*X(3618) = X(6)+2*X(1125) = X(10)+2*X(1386) = X(10)-4*X(3589) = X(69)-7*X(3624) = 2*X(141)-5*X(19862) = 2*X(182)+X(946) = X(193)+11*X(5550) = X(551)+2*X(597) = X(1386)+2*X(3589) = 3*X(38023)+X(38047) = 5*X(38023)+X(38087) = 2*X(38023)+X(38089) = 6*X(38023)+X(38191) = 2*X(38029)+X(38146) = 2*X(38040)+X(38118) = 5*X(38047)-3*X(38087) = 2*X(38047)-3*X(38089) = 2*X(38048)+X(38187) = 2*X(38087)-5*X(38089) = 6*X(38087)-5*X(38191)</b>
<p>X(38049) lies on these lines: {1,344}, {2,5847}, {6,1125}, {10,1386}, {69,3624}, {141,19862}, {142,5138}, {182,946}, {193,5550}, {226,1428}, {238,17023}, {354,34378}, {511,10165}, {515,14561}, {516,5085}, {517,38040}, {518,551}, {519,38023}, {524,19883}, {613,13411}, {726,13331}, {758,38051}, {908,29636}, {952,38167}, {1385,18583}, {1503,3817}, {1699,25406}, {1738,17367}, {2308,29684}, {2321,24295}, {2330,12053}, {2800,38119}, {2801,38195}, {2802,38050}, {3242,3636}, {3313,31757}, {3416,3634}, {3452,29645}, {3564,11230}, {3576,14853}, {3616,3751}, {3619,34595}, {3653,14848}, {3663,4672}, {3742,34381}, {3758,24231}, {3763,19878}, {3821,28508}, {3827,5883}, {3836,4349}, {3879,29637}, {3883,29633}, {3923,3946}, {4104,32911}, {4133,4852}, {4297,5480}, {4353,32935}, {4356,4432}, {4357,16468}, {4416,16477}, {4645,29630}, {4663,6329}, {4676,17380}, {4684,29660}, {4697,24177}, {4966,16666}, {4989,5750}, {5009,17200}, {5026,11599}, {5050,5886}, {5092,31730}, {5135,12609}, {5248,36741}, {5249,29852}, {5294,17017}, {5745,29650}, {5845,38054}, {5848,32557}, {5849,38062}, {5850,38046}, {5882,25555}, {6593,13605}, {6776,8227}, {6789,16503}, {10171,10516}, {10186,21153}, {11720,15118}, {11735,32300}, {12017,12699}, {12571,36990}, {13624,21850}, {15254,17045}, {16469,29598}, {16472,20806}, {17301,28526}, {17304,24695}, {17355,32921}, {17364,26150}, {17382,17768}, {17594,35261}, {17772,29594}, {19130,31673}, {20985,28256}, {23659,28288}, {24597,29826}, {25501,37676}, {25524,37492}, {26723,32772}, {28160,38136}, {28194,38064}, {28204,38079}, {28234,38116}, {28236,38144}, {29571,31289}, {29596,32846}, {29666,37685}, {30768,33070}</p>
<p>
X(38049) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {2, 16475}, {1699, 25406}, {3576, 14853}, {3653, 14848}, {5050, 5886}, {5085, 38035}, {14561, 38029}, {38040, 38110}, {38048, 38186}<br>
X(38049) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (10516, 10171), (38118, 38110), (38146, 14561), (38187, 38186), (38191, 38047)<br>
X(38049) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 17353, 4078), (1386, 3589, 10), (4349, 31191, 3836), (4989, 5750, 16825), (16468, 29646, 4357), (38089, 38191, 38047), (38197, 38198, 38167)<br>
</p>
